text: 9.27 Apo 4.36, 9.4, 9.20-22, 1 Ko 9.1, 15.8 Pɨlɨkelak, Banabas, ne Sol nop dad, bɨ Jisas takaw nop dad ameb okok yelak ak amɨl, kɨlop agak, Bɨ anɨb awl mɨnek olap taun Damaskus amnɨg, kanɨb nab ak amek, Jisas mɨseŋ gɨl nop takaw ogɨnap agek nɨgak agak. Kɨdek Damaskus binɨb kɨlop ma pɨlɨkɨl, Jisas takaw tep ak monmon yɨbɨl agñak agak.
